Key Match Events: Zac Gallen struck out 11 in six innings
Pavin Smith hit a three-run homer in the eighth inning
Arizona's offense chased Giants starter Mason Black by the third inning
Pre-Game Insights: Arizona needed a rebound after a losing streak that included a blown eight-run lead and a 11-0 loss to the Giants
The Diamondbacks responded behind a strong performance from their ace
Arizona is.001 behind the New York Mets for the second of three National League wild cards, a game ahead of Atlanta
Post-Match Reflections: These matter big-time, I think we had to prove to ourselves to get back on track, said Diamondbacks first baseman Christian Walker
We've got to put it in play a little bit more, said Giants manager Bob Melvin
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was postponed due to Hurricane Helene, with the Braves and Mets having to play a Monday doubleheader
Giants struck out 17 times in the game
Paul Sewald threw a short bullpen session as he works his way back from a neck/shoulder issue
San Francisco has not named a starter for Friday's opener of a three-game series against St. Louis
Arizona has yet to name a starter for the opener of a three-game series against San Diego on Friday
